it's an oatmeal cream pie so it's an

added 1/2 teaspoon baking powder 1/2

soda and a quarter teaspoon ground

you're making a delicious oatmeal cookie

so that the butter mixture doesn't get
SuperDuper light but it will might
significantly
for a little depth of flavor add one

molasses is an incredible flavor great

about two inches between cookies and

match up I'm getting about eight per
sheet bake your cookies until they're
just set on the edges but still slightly
soft in the center that'll take about
eleven minutes when the cookies have
completely cooled you can make your
filling this is one bar of cream cheese
and six tablespoons of confectioner's

because the moisture in the filling
might make your cookies soggy if you let
them sit around for too long you know
what else these cookies would be really
